GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/categories.description: serves an array of all categories

categories.description: Players attempt to uncover each other's hidden role

GET /api/reviews.description: serves an array of all reviews

GET /api/reviews/:review_id.description: provides a specific review for an object

review.title: A truly Quacking Game; Quacks of Quedlinburg
review.review_body: Ever wish you could try your hand at mixing potions? Quacks of Quedlinburg will have you mixing up a homebrew like no other. Each player buys different ingredients (chips) that are drawn at random to reach the most points, but watch out, you'd better not let your cauldrom explode.

GET /api/users.description: returns an array of all users

GET /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: returns an array of all comments for a given review (id)

comments.body: My dog loved this game too!
comments.author: mallionaire

PATCH /api/reviews/:review_id.description: Increases/decreases votes of a given review by the passed number and returns the value

POST /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: Posts new comment to given review and returns comment
